name: Money Golems Warriors
description:
Money Golems Warriors is a 1 versus 1 party game where you shoot your coins to your opponent in order to steal their own coins. Unfortunately this means that to play this game you’ll need a second player and DEFINITELY two controllers, sorry.

Controls :

  • Left Trigger = Counter Attack
  • Right Trigger = Shoot Coins
  • Left Bumper = Dash
  • Right Bumper = Special Item
  • Left Stick = Move
  • Right Stick = Aim
